author: jstrachan
msg: minor refactor to allow pluggable MessageGroupMap implementations so that we don't have to keep around every single GroupID in RAM if we don't want to (which could very easily become a RAM leak) and can use a provider which uses hashbuckets instead.
added an initial implementation of a hashbucket based MessageGroupMap which should be fine; am waiting on a unit test run to complete before I dare enable it by default :)

msg: Small optimization: increase Java stack space in stack overflow case

author: oheger
msg: Incorporated new expression engine classes into HierarchicalConfiguration; this class now supports pluggable expression engines.
